name: Space Astley: The video game: In Space: Galaxy Edition: REMASTERED: The Movie: The Game: GAME OF THE YEAR EDITION
name_original: Space Astley: The video game: In Space: Galaxy Edition: REMASTERED: The Movie: The Game: GAME OF THE YEAR EDITION
description:
CONTROLS

(Only playable with a keyboard)

  • Left, Right, Up, and Down arrows: Movement
  • Spacebar: Shoot
  • Esc: Restart the game

When you hit the splash screen, just follow the instructions of hitting the spacebar to begin playing!

Description

Fight back against the tools of the trolls by bringing the heat to Space Astley! Oh, right, you've been frozen for a few millennia. Long story short: turns out Rick Astley is an alien overmind, uses the power of trolls to grow in size and strength - yadda, yadda. 

Credits

  • Art and Design - Eleanor Jacques-Morel
  • Music and Sound Effects - Rebecca Larkin
  • Code and Design - Sean MacLean
